text: Episode 140 Guest: Ian Reynolds 11 May 2020 | In this episode we talk about Software and the Apocolypse, with Ian Reynolds Comments Please leave a comment, positive, negative or just something weird. Ian Reynolds Ian Reynolds is a Partner and the Chief Solutions Architect at Zibtek, a software development consultancy focused on helping businesses build custom software. Ian has spent the better part of his career in consulting and has served in diverse industries as Finance, Oil and Gas, Retail Power, Field Services, Midstream Energy, Healthcare, Pharmaceuticals, Transactional Finance, Mergers and Acquisitions, Restructuring, e-commerce, Retail, and software development. html:
Episode 140 Guest: Ian Reynolds

11 May 2020 |

In this episode we talk about Software and the Apocolypse, with Ian Reynolds

Comments

Please leave a comment, positive, negative or just something weird.

Ian Reynolds

Ian Reynolds is a Partner and the Chief Solutions Architect at Zibtek, a software development consultancy focused on helping businesses build custom software.

Ian has spent the better part of his career in consulting and has served in diverse industries as Finance, Oil and Gas, Retail Power, Field Services, Midstream Energy, Healthcare, Pharmaceuticals, Transactional Finance, Mergers and Acquisitions, Restructuring, e-commerce, Retail, and software development.

Guest Episodes:

  • Episode 140 - Software and the Apocolypse
